title: Simplifying analysis of hierarchical HDF5 and NetCDF4 files with xarray-datatree

authors.name: Eniola Awowale
authors.affiliation: NASA Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center

authors.name: Lucas Sterzinger
authors.affiliation: NASA Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center

authors.name: Nick Lenssen
authors.affiliation: NASA Goddard Earth Sciences Data and Information Services Center

description: Xarray-datatree, is a Python package that supports HDFs (Hierarchical Data Format) with hierarchical group structures by creating a tree-like hierarchical data structure in xarray.
